kobe.KBplotter.vtrigger¶

class kobe.KBplotter.vtrigger¶

visualize a trigger map and its contours

Parameters
clslist

confidence levels for contours, e.g. cls=[.5, .9] represent 50% and 90% CL contours. default: None (no contours)

Notes

vtrigger inherients from visualization, and inheriented by trigger.
